document_data.name: Aegis of Assault
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aegis of assault''''' was a [[spell]] known to [[swordmage]]s.
document_data.Effects: ''Aegis of assault'' allowed a swordmage to form an [[arcane]] bond with a creature up to {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} away. If the creature attacked one of the swordmage's allies, the bond weakened their assault. If the creature was still successful, then the bond allowed the swordmage to [[teleportation|teleport]] a distance of up to {{SI|50|ft|long=yes}} in order to retaliate against the attacker.
